price: Et quant à ceux qui luttent pour Notre cause, Nous les guiderons certes sur Nos sentiers, Allah est en vérité avec les bienfaisants.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَنَّهُمۡ سُبُلَنَاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna jāhadū fīnā lanahdiyannahum subulanā wa-inna al-laha lamaʿa al-muḥ'sinīna
